titles.title: 300-nen Fuuin Sareshi Jaryuu-chan to Tomodachi ni Narimashita
An Evil Dragon That Was Sealed Away for 300 Years Became My Friend
300年封印されし邪龍ちゃんと友達になりました

title: 300-nen Fuuin Sareshi Jaryuu-chan to Tomodachi ni Narimashita
title_japanese: 300年封印されし邪龍ちゃんと友達になりました
title_synonyms: An Evil Dragon That Was Sealed Away for 300 Years Became My Friend
synopsis:
Performing a summoning spell calls a monster and binds them to the summoner's command in exchange for fulfilling their desire. Youta is a young man who lives alone and decides to try a simple spell—just so he can talk to someone. But having been told that he does not possess any talent for summoning, he has low expectations.

To his surprise, Youta ends up summoning Mumu, a dragon who had been sealed away in the dark for 300 years! Initially, she makes Youta fear for his life. After conversing with Mumu, however, he discovers that her only wish is to have someone to talk with—just like him! They quickly become friends, but Mumu turns out to be an incredibly emotional and needy dragon. Now faced with her endless daily antics, Youta searches for a way to properly handle his new quirky dragon companion.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
background: 300-nen Fuuin Sareshi Jaryuu-chan to Tomodachi ni Narimashita is a web manga released on the author's Twitter and pixiv accounts from December 23, 2019 to June 17, 2021. The web manga was published as doujinshi, when the volume was released on August 7, 2020. Official serialization started in Magazine pocket on August 4, 2021, and was officially discontinued on July 13, 2022 due to undisclosed circumstances.
